solution_line_template: Dante needs half as many cups of flour to bake his chocolate cake as he needs eggs, meaning he needs {eggs_used}/{flour_divisor} = <<{eggs_used}/{flour_divisor}={cups_of_flour}>>{cups_of_flour} cups of flour for his recipe.
Altogether, Dante needs {cups_of_flour}+{eggs_used} = <<{cups_of_flour}+{eggs_used}={total_ingredients}>>{total_ingredients} eggs and cups of flour for his recipe.
